title: How to Make Your Own Nintendo DS Games

steps.title: Download Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 SP1
steps.content: Download Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 and install it if you do not already have it.

steps.title: Install the program.
steps.content: Install the program. Follow the automated steps, it is really simple. You can choose if you want to add a shortcut or whatnot. The installation directory is C:\DSGameMaker.

steps.title: A Flashcart (Nintendo DS Game Card) will let you run your games on your Nintendo DS.
steps.content: A Flashcart (Nintendo DS Game Card) will let you run your games on your Nintendo DS. See the games page - the section titled 'How to Play'. There are also instructions there for using an emulator - NO$GBA.

steps.title: For reference, devkitPro is the development tool chain with the DS-specific devkitARM, PAlib is a simple add-on library and DS Game Maker is an interface for these so you can make games without having to learn programming.
steps.content: For reference, devkitPro is the development tool chain with the DS-specific devkitARM, PAlib is a simple add-on library and DS Game Maker is an interface for these so you can make games without having to learn programming.

steps.title: These are only rough steps.
steps.content: These are only rough steps. The Manual covers everything in full detail.
